name: Simona's Requiem
overview: Death becomes her... Pick up the scythe as Simona and slash your way through decrepid interconnected world in search of the Fisher King who has hidden behind the moon. Simona's Requiem is a retro-styled platformer Inspired by old action-adventure games but with a modern touch. Travel through varied levels in the desolate land of Lunatergo. Explore caves and plains and battle roaming beasts to find the three Manors, where clues to finishing your quest are hidden.
